item.title: Jared add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jared add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We can't stop here, this is bat country!" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Jared add a quote by Nelson Algren
item.description: "You don't write a novel out of sheer pity any more than you blow a safe out of a vague longing to be rich. A certain ruthlessness and a sense of alienation from society is as essential to creative writing as it is to armed robbery." -- Nelson Algren

item.title: Jared add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I sent the club a wire stating, PLEASE ACCEPT MY RESIGNATION. I DON'T WANT TO BELONG TO ANY CLUB THAT WILL ACCEPT ME AS A MEMBER." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jared add a quote by Chris Boucher
item.description: "Fourth Doctor: You know, the very powerful and the very stupid have one thing in common: they don't alter their views to fit the facts; they alter the facts to fit their views." -- Chris Boucher

item.title: Jared add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description: "One of the greatest tragedies in mankind's entire history may be that morality was hijacked by religion." -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Jared add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Our revels now are ended. These our actors, As I foretold you, were all spirits and Are melted into air, into thin air: And, like the baseless fabric of this vision, The cloud-cappâ€™d towers, the gorgeous palaces, The solemn temples, the great globe itself, Yea, all which it inherit, shall dissolve And, like this insubstantial pageant faded, Leave not a rack behind. We are such stuff As dreams are made on, and our little life Is rounded with a sleep." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jared add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Google can bring you back 100,000 answers. A librarian can bring you back the right one." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jared add a quote by George R.R. Martin
Jared add a quote by Iain M. Banks
item.description: "Empathize with stupidity and you're halfway to thinking like an idiot" -- Iain M. Banks
